name: Retro Telephones Flannel and Cream Minky Baby Blanket
Retro Sunglasses Flannel and Hot Pink Minky Baby Blanket
description:
This Bugaroo handmade baby blanket is made using a layer of super soft retro sunglasses flannel in black and is backed with a layer of ultra soft and luxurious minky dot in hot pink. This super cuddly blanket measures approximately 34.5" x 38.5" and has been top stitched for style and extra durability.

Washer/Dryer Safe. Wash in cold water, tumble dry low. To protect the texture and integrity of the minky, please dot iron. Do not bleach.

Bugaroo products are hand crafted with care and attention to detail. All fabrics are pre-washed in a free and clear detergent prior to construction.

name: Retro Rocket Flannel and Minky Baby Blanket
description:
This Bugaroo handmade baby blanket is made using a layer of super soft retro rocket flannel and is backed with a second layer of warm and luxurious orange minky.  This ultra cuddly blanket measures approximately 39"x33.5" and has been top stitched for style and extra durability.

Washer/Dryer Safe.  Wash in cold water, tumble dry low to preserve the texture of the minky dot. Do not iron. Do not bleach.

Bugaroo products are hand crafted with care and attention to detail.  All fabrics are prewashed in a free and clear detergent prior to constructions.

name: Skull Pirates and Red Dots Flannel Baby Blanket
description:
This Bugaroo handmade baby blanket is made using a layer of super soft flannel in a skull pirate design and is backed with a second layer of coordinating 100% cotton red and white polka dots.  This light weight blanket measures approximately 32x32" and has been top stitched with a double row of brown thread for style and extra durability.

Washer/Dryer Safe.  Wash in cold water, tumble dry low.  Do not bleach.

Bugaroo products are hand crafted with care and attention to detail.  All fabrics are prewashed in a free and clear detergent prior to construction.

name: Retro Owl Flannel and Minky Baby Blanket
description:
This Bugaroo handmade baby blanket is made using a layer of retro owl super soft flannel and is backed with a second layer of warm and luxurious rich, black minky dot. This snuggly blanket measures approximately 35x35" and has been top stitched with a decorative zig zag stitch for extra durability.

Washer/Dryer Safe.  Wash in cold water, tumble dry low to preserve the texture of the minky dot. Do not iron. Do not bleach.

Bugaroo products are hand crafted with care and attention to detail.  All fabrics are prewashed in a free and clear detergent prior to constructions.

name: Skulls & Chevron Hawaiian Baby Girl Blanket
description:
This Bugaroo handmade flannel and chevron baby blanket is the perfect size for swaddling, snuggling, playing and even in the car. It's sure to be your little one's favorite for years to come.   High quality hawaiian print flannel been backed with black chevron velour and measures approximately 32"x37".  

Washer/Dryer Safe.  Wash in cold water, tumble dry low. Do not bleach.

Bugaroo products are hand crafted with care and attention to detail.  All fabrics are prewashed in a free and clear detergent prior to constructions.  For extra style and durability, this blanket has been top stitched.

name: Mustache Flannel and Chevron Baby Blanket
description:
This Bugaroo handmade baby blanket is made using a layer of brown mustache super soft flannel and is backed with a second layer of100% cotton brown chevron.  This light weight blanket measures approximately 31x31" and has been top stitched with a double row of brown thread for style and extra durability.

Washer/Dryer Safe.  Wash in cold water, tumble dry low.  Do not bleach.

Bugaroo products are hand crafted with care and attention to detail.  All fabrics are prewashed in a free and clear detergent prior to construction.

name: Rock Me Mama Like a Wagon Wheel Onesie - Black
description:
This listing includes one WHITE onesie painted with the song lyrics "Rock Me Mama Like a Wagon Wheel" in BLACK. This bugaroo original design was screen printed using non-toxic fabric paint. 

All fabrics are pre-washed before construction in a free and clear hypo-allergenic detergent and are ready to use upon arrival. Washer/Dryer Safe - Machine wash cold with like colors and tumble dry low. Turn inside out to dry.

name: I Heart My Aunt Tee
description:
White toddler tee screen printed with non-toxic fabric paint with a bugaroo original design: I 'heart' my 'ant'.

Washer/Dryer Safe - Machine wash cold with like colors and tumble dry low. Turn inside out to dry.

name: RESERVED LISTING - Harry Potter Baby Shower Gift Set
description:
This is a reserved product listing for Gillian - please do not purchase unless you are Gillian.  If you are interested in a similar order, please contact me directly using by clicking Contact in the footer of this page.

This custom requested Harry Potter baby shower gift set includes:
1 - Hedwig the Owl inspired appliqued Bib & Burp Cloth Set 
1 - Gryffindor inspired striped baby quilt (30"x30")

All baby bibs in this set are backed with minky.  Burp cloths can be backed with chenille or minky - per the customer's request.

name: Mustache and Minky Baby Shower Gift Set
description:
This three piece show stopping baby gift set is sure to be a hit!  It includes a blanket measuring approximately 31" square that has been backed in rich and luxurious minky.  Also, a mustache appliqued bib backed in red minky and a matching chenille burp cloth with an appliqued mustache.

Each piece of this baby gift set was handmade in the USA by Bugaroo Boutique.  

All products are washer/dryer safe. We recommend cold water setting and tumble dry low to preserve the texture and softness of the minky.

This one of a kind baby shower gift set will be wrapped in tissue paper and satin ribbon and shipped via USPS First Class Mail.  Tracking Information will be sent at time of shipment.
